front.title: Leaf discovery mechanism for mLDP based P2MP/MP2MP LSP

abstract.t: This document describes a mechanism for a root node to discover the leaf nodes of an mLDP based P2MP/MP2MP LSP. Such kind of function can then be used for multiplexing/aggregating various applications relying on mLDP as the P2MP/MP2MP LSP setup. Examples of such applications are P2MP PW [I-D.draft-martini-pwe3-p2mp-pw], VPLS multicast [I-D.draft-ietf-l2vpn-vpls-mcast], L3VPN multicast [I-D.draft-ietf-l3vpn-2547bis-mcast].
